alert.note: Alert for Lake; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 4:05AM EST until January 02 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Steady snow along with lake effect banding will persist the next few hours along the Lake Michigan shore. Additional accumulation up to 1 to 2 inches will be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Indiana and northeast Illinois. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered roadways, especially non-major thoroughfares.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
